RainbruRPG::Gui::ModifyServer

RainbruRPG::Gui::ModifyServer Class Reference

#include <modifyserver.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The xident modify server dialog.

It is used by the xIdent tool to modify a server using curlServerModify.

Definition at line 44 of file modifyserver.h.

anonymous enum

The enumeration defining the Fox selectors, used in event mechanism.

Enumerator:
ID_NYI  Not Yet Implemented Identifier.
ID_BTN_OK  The OK button identifier.
ID_BTN_CANCEL  The cencel button identifier.
ID_SPI_CLI  Setting the new value to FXDialogBox::ID_LAST.
ID_LAST  Setting the new value to FXDialogBox::ID_LAST.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Gui::ModifyServer::create (  )  [virtual]

The FOX-Toolkit create method.

It creates the instance of FXDialogBox and set the placement behavior to PLACEMENT_SCREEN.
